AC 14 	Initiative +2 (12)

Medium Fey (Goblinoid), Chaotic Evil
Bulettes
Ravenous, Subsurface Land Sharks
Habitat: Grassland, Hill, Mountain; Treasure: None
Also called “land sharks,” bulettes are single-minded predators that burrow under, leap over, and burst through obstacles in pursuit of their quarry. They
burrow rapidly just belowground. On sensing movement, they erupt from below, attempting to catch prey in their oversize maws.
Bulette
Bulettes range under vast territories. They often threaten animal herds, and they can wipe out whole farming communities.
